name: Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland - Premium Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Lulua no Atorie ~ Arland no Renkinjutsushi 4 ~
- Lulua-exclusive costume DLC (before it is released)
- Lulua & The Alchemists of Arland Memorial Art Book
- Lulua no Atorie Sound Archives (one disc)
- Two acrylic mini character charms
